Class Setting

  • java.lang.Object
    • Setting

  • public class Setting
extends java.lang.Object
    A Setting class that is used to control a User account information and to check connectivity of a fitband and add a fitband
    Since:
    version 1.0
    Version:
    1.0 (11/10/16)
    Author:
    Hector Cervantes
